name: The Harley Street Heart and Vascular Centre (Gleneagles)

reviews.text: Dr. Rohit is an outstanding cardiologist—patient, knowledgeable, and truly caring. He explains everything clearly and makes you feel completely at ease. Highly recommended!

I highly recommend the cardiology team at Harley Street!
I have been seeing the team for over 3 years now and they have been wonderful. From the moment I arrived, the staff was welcoming and professional. The doctors took the time to investigate my condition thoroughly, making me feel informed and confident in my care. The facilities added to the experience, and the follow-up care was excellent. Thank you, Harley Street, for your exceptional dedication to patient health!

I accompany my mom to have vascular test.
Dr.Rohit is very helpful and clear on giving the information.

We felt henis kind and can understand us as a patient

Dr Reginald Liew is very knowledgeable as well as patient and detailed in his explanations. He was also able to link to my other conditions (head, gastric etc. even though I hadn’t told him about them at first). I’m definitely very glad to be able to consult him. The staff at the clinic were friendly and professional in their service; one of them also gave detailed instructions (not every clinic does so) on how to take the medication. Great doc and clinic overall!

Dr Rohit is amazing and ensures patients understand how to manage their situation and guides them thoroughly. He clearly knows his topic and has huge experience which immediately gives confidence. Thank you Dr for the extraordinary results achieved together in short time!
